data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Aspe, Nonillon M., James, Samuel W. (2014): New species of Pheretima (Oligochaeta: Megascolecidae) from the Mt. Malindang Range, Mindanao Island, Philippines. Zootaxa 3881 (5): 401-439, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3881.5.1
